docs.text:
The MainWindowController in the ApplicationController needs a valid FXML File. The bindings for Navigation, Workspace and StatusBar Controller uses the fx:id values.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<?import java.net.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>

<AnchorPane xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/8" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.sfxcode.sapphire.core.demo.appdemo.controller.MainWindowController">
    <children>
        <BorderPane AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="0.0"
                    AnchorPane.rightAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="0.0">
            <top>
                <AnchorPane fx:id="navigationPane"
                            minHeight="40.0" maxHeight="40.0"
                            styleClass="navigation" />
            </top>
            <center>
                <AnchorPane fx:id="workspacePane"
                            prefHeight="520.0" prefWidth="800.0"/>
            </center>
            <bottom>
                <AnchorPane fx:id="statusPane"
                            minHeight="20.0" maxHeight="20.0"
                            styleClass="status" />
            </bottom>
        </BorderPane>
    </children>
    <stylesheets>
        <URL value="@MainWindow.css" />
    </stylesheets>
</AnchorPane>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
<AnchorPane prefHeight="40.0"
            xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/8.0.65" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1"
            fx:controller="com.sfxcode.sapphire.core.demo.appdemo.controller.DefaultNavigationController">
    <children>
        <HBox layoutY="-10.0" prefHeight="40.0" spacing="10.0"
              AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="0.0"
              AnchorPane.rightAnchor="-44.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="0.0">
            <children>
                <Button onAction="#actionShowWorkspaceController" text="Workspace 1"/>
                <Button onAction="#actionShowSecondWorkspaceController" text="Workspace 2"/>
                <Button onAction="#actionShowThirdWorkspaceController" text="Workspace 3"/>
                <Button onAction="#actionReload" text="Reload"/>
                <Button onAction="#actionLoadWorkspaceFromStack" text="Workspace From Stack"/>
                <Button onAction="#actionToggleNavigation" text="Switch Navigation"/>
            </children>
            <padding>
                <Insets left="10.0" top="5.0"/>
            </padding>
        </HBox>
    </children>
</AnchorPane>
